value.title: U.S. exempts self-driving vehicles from some crash standards
value.excerpt: The outgoing Trump administration said on Thursday it was issuing new rules that would allow manufacturers of automated vehicles to bypass some crash standards required of conventional vehicles, which would cut production costs.

value.title: Full Autonomous Self Driving Teslas in Vegas Boring Tunnels by the End of 2021
value.excerpt: The LVCVA board approved $6.25 million to Boring to operate the mile-long convention center system from Feb. 1 through June 30, 2022. At no cost, authorized access to Boring to dig tunnels connecting

value.title: DJI is building a new team that will work on self driving technology
value.excerpt: The popular drone making brand, DJI, is apparently building a new team that will be working on developing self driving or autonomous technologies. The company has put up various job listings and has already begun hiring as well.

value.title: Tesla files to use new ‘millimeter-wave radar’ on its ‘full self-driving’ electric cars
value.excerpt: Tesla has applied with the FCC for the use of a new “millimeter-wave radar” for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving in its electric cars. New Tesla Radar Tesla uses a front-facing radar sensor hidden inside the front fascia of its vehicles as part of its Autopilot/Full Self-Driving (FSD) sensor suite.

value.title: Tesla’s main self-driving rival isn’t Google—it’s Intel’s Mobileye
value.excerpt: Mobileye's self-driving strategy has a number of things in common with that of Tesla, the world's most valuable automaker. Like Tesla, Mobileye is aiming to gradually evolve its current driver-assistance technology into a fully self-driving system.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Stocks: The 10 Best AI Companies
value.excerpt: AI could be the 21st century’s biggest new industry. Long a focal point of science fiction, AI is no longer a curious theme to ponder for the distant future; it’s here.

value.title: IBM Leads in Quantum Computing, Ford in Driverless Car Patents
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence, quantum computers and autonomous vehicles are among the fastest-growing areas of technology, with American companies often in the lead, according to a new study of U.S. patents issued over the past five years.

value.title: Baidu Confirms Plans to Join the Smoking Hot EV Market
value.excerpt: In a press release on Monday, Baidu (NASDAQ:BIDU) confirmed that it was entering the red-hot electric-vehicle (EV) market. The company plans to set up an independent subsidiary co

value.title: Self-driving truck company Kodiak Robotics hauls in honor at CES after reaching Texas milestone
value.excerpt: The company completed two 800-mile roundtrip commercial shipments in December between Dallas and Houston relying only on Kodiak’s autonomous driving system.

value.title: Why ethics should guide artificial intelligence use
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the theory and development of computer systems able to perform tasks that normally require human intelligence. AI makes it possible for machines to learn from experience,

value.title: NIO teams up with Nvidia, Qualcomm in self-driving car development
value.excerpt: NIO has partnered with Nvidia and Qualcomm in the development of the next generation of automated vehicles. The Chinese vendor, which holds a strong position in its domestic electric vehicle (EV) market,

value.title: GM Self-Driving Company Hires Former Delta Executive as COO
value.excerpt: Cruise LLC, the self-driving car startup majority owned by General Motors Co., has hired former Delta Air Lines Inc. Chief Operating Officer Gil West for the same position as it prepares to start offering paid robotaxi rides in San Francisco.

value.title: Samsung’s Digital Cockpit is a futuristic concept for self-driving car interiors
value.excerpt: Samsung has announced a concept tech that imagines turning cars of the future into mobile offices and entertainment centers.

value.title: Baidu teams up with Geely to create new self-driving car company
value.excerpt: The Chinese search giant will focus on the intelligent driving side of things while Geely will bring its manufacturing capabilities to the table.

value.title: The Edge: What Does It Mean For Artificial Intelligence?
value.excerpt: What Can Be Done At The Edge The most notable use case for the edge and AI is the self-driving car. The complexities are mind boggling, which is why the development of this technology has taken so long.

value.title: Hyundai to Partner With Apple on Self-Driving Car ... but Maybe Not
value.excerpt: Hyundai says it will partner with Apple on a self-driving car, but then quickly shifts gears to say it has received requests from a number of technology suitors.

value.title: Self-Driving Cars And The Newest ‘Move Over, Slow Down’ Laws
value.excerpt: The law and prudent driving dictate that you should move over and slow down when nearing stranded vehicles on the side of the road, which is easier to say than for self-driving cars to achieve.

value.title: Hyundai in 'early talks' with Apple for self-driving electric car
value.excerpt: Hyundai Motor Co. said Friday it is in the early stages of talks with tech giant Apple to jointly develop and produce a self-driving electric car.

value.title: Apple's 'Tesla killer' self-driving car is at least 5 years away, according to a new report
value.excerpt: For years, rumors of Apple's self-driving car have swirled — but the latest report says it's still at least five years from its big debut.

value.title: Chinese search giant Baidu to make electric cars
value.excerpt: Chinese search giant Baidu plans to make electric vehicles with help from Geely, the country’s largest private automaker, according to a new report from Reuters. It’s the latest Chinese conglomerate to venture into the flourishing electric vehicle market,

value.title: Cox Automotive to service self-driving fleet of Hyundai's joint venture
value.excerpt: Privately held Cox Automotive Inc entered an agreement on Thursday to provide cleaning and maintenance services for the self-driving cars of Motional, a joint venture between Hyundai Motor Co and auto supplier Aptiv Plc .

value.title: Waymo Ditches 'Self-Driving' Term in Apparent Dig at Tesla
value.excerpt: Don't call Waymo's vehicles "self-driving." The company this week announced that it's replacing the term with the broader "fully autonomous driving tech." "It may seem like a small change, but it's an important one,

value.title: Cox Automotive to service self-driving fleet of Hyundai's joint venture
value.excerpt: Privately held Cox Automotive Inc entered an agreement on Thursday to provide cleaning and maintenance services for the self-driving cars of Motional, a joint venture between Hyundai Motor Co and auto supplier Aptiv Plc .

value.title: Waymo won't talk about 'self-driving' cars anymore, in apparent dig at Tesla
value.excerpt: Waymo takes a stab at Tesla over its use of the term "self-driving" in its new Full Self Driving feature. Alphabet-owned Waymo has stopped referring to "self-driving" to describe its technology and form now on will only use the term "fully autonomous driving technology" instead.

value.title: EV Dreams Power Baidu but May Not Last
value.excerpt: The company needs a new growth model. But a road trip into the frothy EV industry might prove long and bumpy.

value.title: Waymo says it’s ditching the term ‘self-driving’ in dig at Tesla
value.excerpt: The Google sister company says it is through using the term “self-driving cars” to describe its fleet of autonomous vehicles. And it is subtly pointing fingers at Elon Musk’s Tesla as the reason why. Waymo says it is committing to “using more ...

value.title: MOVES-Former Intel, Tesla chip exec Jim Keller joins artificial intelligence startup
value.excerpt: Jim Keller, a prominent computing chip architect who left Intel Corp last year, has joined a Toronto-based startup developing artificial intelligence chips.

value.title: Self-driving software startup Oxbotica raises $47mln in latest funding round
value.excerpt: Self-driving software startup Oxbotica said on Wednesday it has raised $47 million in its latest funding round led by the venture arm of oil giant BP and including health and safety device maker Halma Plc and Tencent.

value.title: Self-Driving Cars And Asimov’s Three Laws About Robots
value.excerpt: Asimov's famous Three Laws of robotics are considered in the use case of self-driving cars, and found to be aspirational but not ironclad.

value.title: We Built Google. This Is Not the Company We Want to Work For.
